speedAttribute.name: Speed Attribute Path
speedAttribute.hint: Object path on the actor to read base speed from (PF2e default works out of the box).

dashMultiplier.name: Action Rings / Multiplier
dashMultiplier.hint: 2 = Two-Action Ring (Yellow), 3 = Three-Action Ring (Orange). 0 disables the secondary ring.

smartRouting.name: Smart Routing (Beta)
smartRouting.hint: If enabled, dragging a token will automatically route around walls (A* Pathfinding).

routingMode.name: Routing Mode
routingMode.hint: When should Smart Routing be active?

ghostTrail.name: Show Ghost Trail
ghostTrail.hint: Shows the path a token has taken this round when hovering over it.

ghostTrailTimeout.name: Trail Timeout (Seconds)
ghostTrailTimeout.hint: If > 0, the trail clears automatically X seconds after movement stops. Useful if 'Always' is enabled.

ghostTrailShare.name: Share Ghost Trails
ghostTrailShare.hint: If enabled, your movement trails are sent to other players.

fallbackSpeed.name: Fallback Speed
fallbackSpeed.hint: Used when measuring distance with no token (e.g. Measure Tool).
